text: Vuhred (; Leksikon občin kraljestev in dežel zastopanih v državnem zboru, vol. 4: Štajersko. 1904. Vienna: C. Kr. Dvorna in Državna Tiskarna, p. 264.) is a village on the right bank of the Drava River in the Municipality of Radlje ob Dravi in Slovenia.Radlje ob Dravi municipal site The parish church in the settlement is dedicated to Saint Lawrence and belongs to the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Maribor. It was built in 1884 on the foundations of a 17th- century church.Slovenian Ministry of Culture register of national heritage reference number 3509 ==References== ==External links== * *Vuhred on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Radlje ob Dravi
title: Vuhred
